LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="49659376410643488c1849c6c6d6caba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]My name is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf14"/]Lapi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm delighted to be feeling
the urge to paint again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="49659376410643488c1849c6c6d6caba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]There are so many unique individuals at
this camp.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm finding plenty of inspiration
for new art pieces!
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="d2250d815e8044e882e1aeed2f00f3e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]As usual,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I rushed out without my painting
tools and my work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2250d815e8044e882e1aeed2f00f3e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]My work is still in my head though,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I
can always paint it again if I must.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="3fd162e691f949d7b92eed7bdd3146dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Painting is like breathing to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3fd162e691f949d7b92eed7bdd3146dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in the sense that I feel like I'm not
really living if I'm not creating art.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="f19688f6cf054e5fb31f2a6fc99b8522" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Since I was young, I have always wondered
why more folks don't paint.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f19688f6cf054e5fb31f2a6fc99b8522" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]There are times when words are woefully
inadequate for expressing certain ideas.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Painting is such an elegant alternative.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="e99ac400802e41caaefd465a089acd94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When I was inspired to draw while on the
spaceship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized I had forgotten my
painting tools again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e99ac400802e41caaefd465a089acd94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I painted the tour guide's face using sauce
on the in-flight meal plate.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e99ac400802e41caaefd465a089acd94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]She was speechless.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Dumbfounded by my
skill,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I imagine.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="70e023f83160498c8579183cfaff2ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I think it's natural that you would want to
make art when you see a blank wall...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="70e023f83160498c8579183cfaff2ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]But I got scolded by the captain for
sketching on the outer wall of the
S.S. Shepherd with some pagodite stone.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="9f16b37d8b3d469a96db3265a3972259" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I feel like I could create an art piece like
no one has ever imagined before now that
I've seen this place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f16b37d8b3d469a96db3265a3972259" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]This journey was a lot more exciting than I
expected it to be.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Next time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll at least
remember my painting supplies.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="3e2b6c5ae6534644aa2d429daca7d1e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I plan to paint the scenery of this planet
as seen by a leafling...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hope I can recall
all the details.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e2b6c5ae6534644aa2d429daca7d1e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]If I succeed in capturing some of these
vivid memories,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] fragmented though they
are,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it'll be a one-of-a-kind art collection.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="9b31fd7c48fa4069abcb7754978c1b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There's a piece I'd like to create when I get
back home.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A record of your adventures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
if you will.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9b31fd7c48fa4069abcb7754978c1b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]It will be a simple but dynamic line drawing
on a sepia background.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9b31fd7c48fa4069abcb7754978c1b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]My greatest masterpiece yet!
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="e9f3d82d71144307abbb8dfb4239b2d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]As usual,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I rushed out without my painting
tools and my work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9f3d82d71144307abbb8dfb4239b2d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]My work is still in my head though,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I
can always paint it again if I must.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="d26abada142c437f82e6c788d291529c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Painting is like breathing to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d26abada142c437f82e6c788d291529c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in the sense that I feel like I'm not
really living if I'm not creating art.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="925cbad16c7e428d95bd99ad81b736e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Since I was young, I have always wondered
why more folks don't paint.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="925cbad16c7e428d95bd99ad81b736e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]There are times when words are woefully
inadequate for expressing certain ideas.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Painting is such an elegant alternative.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="584c54c2d3be40db8e2e00b266843d98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When I was inspired to draw while on the
spaceship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized I had forgotten my
painting tools again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="584c54c2d3be40db8e2e00b266843d98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I painted the tour guide's face using sauce
on the in-flight meal plate.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="584c54c2d3be40db8e2e00b266843d98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]She was speechless.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Dumbfounded by my
skill,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I imagine.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="1e6fa375357e44438a247953816e7998" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I think it's natural that you would want to
make art when you see a blank wall...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1e6fa375357e44438a247953816e7998" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]But I got scolded by the captain for
sketching on the outer wall of the
S.S. Shepherd with some pagodite stone.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="c21d6869c9d34985adef3123b8764954" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Animated movement,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] dynamic facial
features,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and those expressive tails![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Dogs are fantastic subjects for art.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="61983d1dc2bb4c11be6affbf2c765b24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My subjects come alive for me when I draw
the eyes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's why I haven't drawn the
eyes on the image of you in my head yet.
LF013.LF013_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf14"/][UE:Meta key="3dda468e3cbe46098fe765d061dc2051" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]If you would model different poses for
me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've got a feeling I could paint some
outstandingly realistic self-portraits!
